criteria.name: delta_rule_applied
criteria.description: Report references a previous_scan and explicitly identifies events as new vs carried over

criteria.name: scan_coverage_reported
criteria.description: scan_coverage shows non-zero counts for at least 2 of: competitors, markets, contacts, projects

criteria.name: evidence_backed
criteria.description: Each event has an evidence_url or vault path, not unsourced claims

criteria.name: urgency_conservative
criteria.description: this-week urgency used only for events with genuine time pressure, not just importance

criteria.name: actionable_suggestions
criteria.description: Each event has a specific suggested_action, not generic advice

criteria.name: no_placeholders
criteria.description: No TODO, TBD, PLACEHOLDER, or template brackets in output
